metadata.title: USN-3195-1 -- Nova-LXD vulnerability
metadata.description: James Page discovered that Nova-LXD incorrectly set up virtual network devices when creating LXD instances. This could result in an unintended firewall configuration.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3195-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  nova-compute-lxd - 13.2.0-0ubuntu1.16.04.1 python-nova.lxd - 13.2.0-0ubuntu1.16.04.1 python-nova-lxd - 13.2.0-0ubuntu1.16.04.1 No subscription required
